name: Extended Stare
text: Your hypnotic stare has greater reach than normal.
benefit: The range of your hypnotic stare increases by 10 feet.
special: You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.
text_zh: 你的催眠注视具有更远的范围。
prerequisites_zh: 催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）职业能力。
benefit_zh: 你的催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）的范围增加10尺。
special_zh: 你可以多次选取该专长，其效果会叠加。
